alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:43PM CDT until April 13 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 643 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area to near Lake Maloney State Recreation Area to near Maxwell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Platte, Hershey, Maxwell, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Keith, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, O`Fallons and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 160 and 193. Highway 83 between mile markers 72 and 103. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
